fulltext: IOSystem shall with probability >=0.5 until fail_io satisfy !down

semantics.description:
ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution.
TRIGGER: first point in the interval.
REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must remain true until (but not necessarily including) the point where the stop condition holds, or to the end of the interval. If the stop condition never occurs, RES must hold until the end of the scope, or forever.  If the stop condition holds at the trigger, the requirement is satisfied.

semantics.description: ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution. TRIGGER: first point in the interval. REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at some point with distance <= 10 from the trigger (i.e., at trigger, trigger+1, ..., or trigger+10). If the interval ends sooner than trigger+10, then RES need not hold.

fulltext: System shall with probability <=0.5 after 10 ticks satisfy !minimum

semantics.description: ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution. TRIGGER: first point in the interval. REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must be false at all time points with distance <=10 from the trigger (i.e., trigger, trigger+1, ..., and trigger+10). Moreover, RES must hold at the point that is at distance 10+1 from the trigger, that is, trigger+10+1, except if the end of the interval occurs earlier.
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: (H((OT(10, 0, ZtoPre(false)) => minimum)) and H((H(minimum) => OT(10, 0, ZtoPre(false)))))
